tool_description: The YouTube Video Download API allows you to generate download links for YouTube videos. By providing a video URL, the API retrieves the highest quality video stream available for download. The generated link can then be used to initiate the video download.
name: YT Downloader Api
title: YT Downloader Api

api_list.name: Download Get Endpoint
api_list.description: The "Generate YouTube Video Download Link" endpoint allows you to obtain a secure download link for a YouTube video. By providing the URL of a YouTube video, the API will retrieve the highest quality video stream available for download and generate a link that users can click to initiate the download.
